title.narrative: Share-Net Burkina Faso SN-BF

description.narrative: Share-Net Burkina Faso is the knowledge plateform on sexual and reproductive health and rights.Established in April 2021,Share-Net Burkina Faso is working on knowledge management through four pathways that are:knowlege generation,knowledge translation,knowledge sharing,and the promotion of knowledge use.The hub is also a network of members that are working together to improving policies and practices in favour of sexual and reproductive health and rights.

activity-date.narrative: According to the convention the activities of Share-Net Burkina Faso will take en end in 31/2/2024;
Share-Net Burkina Faso has started its activities on April 2021 which corresponds to the starting of the collaboration with Share-Net International

recipient-country.narrative: Burkina Faso is a country locaed in West Africa,commonly called the land of upright men,the majority of its population is young and faced to many issues of sexual and reproductive health and rights.The government wirh the support of local and international NGO works to help young people face those issues through many projects ans programms

title.narrative: The network of Share-Net country hubs is connected and promotes the jointly developed SRHR knowledge agenda

description.narrative: Cross-country learning

title.narrative: Number of training/capacity buiilding sessions for SN country hubs

description.narrative: Cross-country learning

comment.narrative: Share-Net Burkina has planned to participate into trainings organized by Share-Net International

Share-Net Burkina Faso since its establishment held a session with the Embassy to introduce the project its objectives its expectations with regard to the Embassy. It was an opportunity to make recommendations for a good implementation of the project and at the same time request the accompaniment and support of the Embassy. The hub also took part in a session organized by the Embassy on the involvement of young people in political governance in Burkina Faso. It was an occasion to establish a link between this theme and the Meaningful participation of young people that Share-Net International promotes.

title.narrative: Financial management of the Share-Net knowledge platform

description.narrative: Financial sustainability

title.narrative: Number of proposals submitted to seeking funds

description.narrative: To extent to which the financial execution is in line with financial planning

comment.narrative: Share-Net Burkina Faso in 2021 did not submit a call for application or a request for funds; However, the secretariat participated in the SHIRIM workshop on fundraising institutional. During the session the secretariat learned a lot about fundraising, the different stages in fundraising and was even able to draw up a map of its potential donors that will serve for fundraising next years.

Share-Net Burkina Faso since its establishment held a session with the Embassy to introduce the project its objectives its expectations with regard to the Embassy. It was an opportunity to make recommendations for a good implementation of the project and at the same time request the accompaniment and support of the Embassy. The hub also took part in a session organized by the Embassy on the involvement of young people in political governance in Burkina Faso. It was an occasion to establish a link between this theme and the Meaningful participation of young people that Share-Net International promotes.

comment.narrative: Share-Net Burkina Faso as a new hub country did not yet have a website in 2021. All articles concerning the hub and the activities carried out were shared on the official Facebook page, Twitter and the website of the host organization in awaiting the deployment of its personal website. A general newsletter on the project launching was written and shared on the social medias of the host organization and others networks.

title.narrative: Ensuring evidence is presented in formats appropriate for the intended audience to facilitate accessibility, understanding and use of knowledge

description.narrative: Knowledge translation

title.narrative: Number of knowledge products created by Communities of Practice

description.narrative: Number and kind of knowledge that has been translated into the appropriate formats

comment.narrative: In 2021 Share-Net Burkina did not have yet any members, this delayed the establishment of a community of practice. We have registered new members later at the end of the year. On the other hand, the secretariat participated in a workshop on the concept of the community of practice in Bamako, Mali. An article about the session was written and published on social media. In addition, a global report has been written on the overall activity
